segments.text: Good coming , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Mr . Bob , Room 309 . I'm checking out today . Can I have my bill now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . Please wait a moment . Here is your bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the charge for your laundry service on Nov . 20thA
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I did't take any laundry service during my stay here . I think you have added someone else's .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you mind waiting a moment while we check it with the department concerned ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't mind waiting as long as we get this straightened out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very sorry , Mr . Bob . There has been a mistake . We'll correct the bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't matter . Here is the money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . Hope to see you again .
segments.speaker: S1
